column5: Just started seeing the ads for the Toronto Boat Show coming up in a week or so anybody planning on attending or setting up a meet and greet? I haven't been in a couple of years and was wondering if it was going to be worth it or not.  Kawartha Kev
I will probably be down...to make sure that my Lund is NOT on display, and to check out accessories. I believe it runs from the 13th to the 21st?
